full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI SGO NAS GZHAN DON DU ZHI RGYAS KYI LAS SGRUB TSUL DGA' LDAN SNYAN BRGYUD KYI GDAMS PA THUN MONG MA YIN PA'O, ,
